name.baseName: Resin buttons ; Resin oil, accelerator, curing agent, thinner, pigment, etc. ; Casting plate, casting rod, punching, slicing, button making, polishing ; All sizes; NESPS2
树脂钮扣 ; 树脂油、促进剂、固化剂、稀释剂、颜料等 ; 浇板、浇棒、冲坯、切片、制扣、抛光 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
technology.technologicalApplicability: 本数据集描述的树脂钮扣是利用树脂油、促进剂、固化剂、稀释剂和颜料等材料制造的。制作过程包括浇制板材、棒材、冲压、切片、制扣和抛光。这些树脂钮扣有各种尺寸，可用于服装、配饰和时尚等各种产业。污染控制的末端处理技术包括厌氧和好氧生物处理以及物理化学处理，设计用于有效处理氨氮、化学需氧量和废水。其他技术包括活性炭吸附、低温等离子体、光催化和光解，用于控制挥发性有机化合物的排放。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码41,四级代码4119文件，在完整版文件中第2441页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisAnaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment + physicochemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management95，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是厌氧生物处理法+好养生物处理法+物理化学法，其效率为95，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisAnaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment + physicochemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management60，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是厌氧生物处理法+好养生物处理法+物理化学法，其效率为60，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

源文件中描述为为树脂钮扣，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisActivated carbon adsorption，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management70，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是活性炭吸附，其效率为70，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废气治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/废气产污工段正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisAnaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment + physicochemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management94，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
污染物指标化学需氧量的末端治理技术是厌氧生物处理法+好养生物处理法+物理化学法，其效率为94，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为化学需氧量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
